item.title: Black Estate
item.desc:
Black Estate is a remarkable place for wine. Swing by and experience the Black Estate Tasting Room, situated at the top of the Black Estate vineyard slope. Wine tastings and light lunches are served with beautiful views of Waipara Valley and beyond.
Open 10am - 5pm, closed Tuesdays and Wednesdays.
Bookings at (03) 314 6085 or bookings@blackestate.co.nz.

item.title: Fiddlers Green
item.desc:
Fiddler's Green is rated by Cuisine Wine Annual as a "must visit, not to be missed" vineyard.
Fiddler's Green has a mission to produce handcrafted estate grown wines of consistently high quality, style and elegance for the discerning consumer.

item.title: Greystone Wines
item.desc:
Situated on SH1, in the Waipara Valley - Greystone Wines is a family owned vineyard producing premium award winning wines.
We welcome you to come and try our range in a fantastic setting overlooking our vines and rolling mountains.
Come and meet our team - Our Cellar Door is open 7 days from 11am - 4pm

item.title: Muddy Water Fine Wines
item.desc: Made up of the words wai (water) and para (sediment), Waipara translates as Muddy Water. The first production of this label was in 1997, now Muddy Water is part of the Greystone Wines family. They are located on State Highway One, opposite the entrance to the Glenmark Church.

item.title: Pegasus Bay Winery
item.desc:
Pegasus Bay Winery offers a wide range of award-winning wines for you to taste and purchase. Wine tasting/sales: 10am - 5pm
Indoor and outdoor dining - bookings recommended. Restaurant: 12noon - 4pm

item.title: Terrace Edge Vineyard & Olive Grove
item.desc:
Family owned vineyard and olive grove, producing premium, award-winning wines and extra virgin olive oil.
Come and enjoy the tastings and the stunning landscape. Hours: Daily 11am - 4.30pm, Weekdays - please phone ahead

item.title: The Mud House Winery & Cafe
item.desc:
Our House is Your House.
The Mud House Winery & Cafe offers local and overseas visitors one of the South Island's top destinations for the ultimate SHOP, TASTE, DINE, BUY WINE experience.
Open daily: 10am - 5pm.

item.title: Torlesse Wines
item.desc:
100% Estate made and grown, our wines are produced from our own vineyards and are made and bottled on site at our Waipara Winery.
Wine tasting facilities are available at our cellar-door outlet at Waipara, together with a growing range of wine accessories and interesting arts and crafts.
Torlesse is a foundation member of Greening Waipara and is designated SUSTAINABLE by the NZ Wine accreditation audit.
Cellar door sales 7 DAYS 11am- 5pm
